title: UI Path Developer
job_overview:
We are seeking a skilled Robotic Process Automation (RPA) UI Path Developer to build and maintain software solutions that automate tedious and time-consuming manual business processes. In addition to technical development, this role includes workflow design, documentation, testing, and user training/support.
The ideal candidate brings deep expertise in RPA development and is comfortable collaborating across teams and technologies.

This is a flexible, 100% remote, project-based role with the potential for long-term engagement. If you're looking for a side gig that offers competitive hourly pay and compensation for every hour worked, this role could be a perfect fit!
